document_data.name: Memnon's Fingers
document_data.mainbody: '''Memnon's Fingers'''<ref group="note">The name of the hall presumably is a reference to an [[efreeti]]'s hands, which are able to [[produce flame]]s. ([[Memnon (efreeti)|Memnon]] was an infamous efreeti in [[Calimshan|Calishite]] history.) was the guildhall of the Illuminated Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters of [[Calimport]].
document_data.Location: This guildhall was located in [[Jhalal Drudach]], in [[Jhaapir Sabban]] of [[Quill Ward]].
document_data.Structure: The building was notable for its unique construction. It was pentagonal, with a four-story minaret at each of its five corners. The minarets were glazed in an off-white color with patterns in the brick to make them appear like [[candle]]s. The tops of the "candles" contained [[Continual flame|everburning flames]].
